results.label: WeChat
results.description: "WeChat. The new way to connect. " WeChat is a mobile phone text and voice messaging communication service developed by Tencent in China . Clients are available for Android, iPhone, Windows Phone and Symbian platforms. Languages supported include English, traditional/simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Portuguese, Thai, and Vietnamese. WeChat is supported on Wi-Fi, 3G and 4G data networks.
